Caribbean beachfront 5 minutes from the town , 15 minutes from the mud volcano , 50 minutes from Monteria. Providing services : Accommodation in rooms for up to 32 people in multiple accommodation with air conditioning , camping by the sea , restaurant , swimming pool , kiosks event hammocks , green areas , private parking , internet. Ideal for a pleasant rest and contemplative space.

Beachfront , providing services : Restaurant with specialty fish and seafood - Wireless Internet - Disco Bar - Rumba Beach - Wi fi - Jacuzzi - Rooms with fan, air conditioning and private bath - Safety deposit boxes - Tents on the beach - parking - Attention of social and business events - Guidance on tours - 10 minutes of the mud volcano .

Beachfront , offers services : Rooms double and multiple accommodation in cabins with beds and fan, private bathroom , tv - Restaurant with varied diet - internet - parking ( cars, jeeps , vans , motorcycles ) - Volly beach - Tours.

15 minutes from the county seat and the seashore. Mud density allows people to float and swim on the surface. This place is visited by tourists from around the world and is recognized for its medicinal benefits .

find a cave which is a stone ornament in ancient Jerusalem used to place religious images , also we found a baptismal font also known as baptistery , with a work of art made ​​of sea shells depicting the baptism of Jesus Christ and the Jordan River made by the late Mr. Hector hotel owner Lighthouse by order of the then pastor Gilberto León Franco ; a source is composed of a closed circuit.

Just 4 km from the county seat via San Juan de Urabá , is a resort of natural pools just 150mts away from the beach, with crystal clear and excellent vegetation waters , making it an estuary and a place to visit and appreciate nature in all its glory without human intervention .
Place to take a few good drinks and have a good time.
